reviews.author: Anonymous Frog
reviews.text: This dog product absolutely changed my dog's life! My dog lost two pounds during the first week we played fetch with these balls!

reviews.author: Anonymous Mouse
reviews.text: My dog loved playing fetch with these balls but they were kind of easy to lose since they bounce so much.

reviews.author: Anonymous Tiger
reviews.text: My dog's vet recommended these treats to me after she said that my dog was developing a lot of plaque near his gums. I'm glad to say that my dog's dental hygeine has improved tremendously after eating these treats!

reviews.author: Anonymous Zebra
reviews.text: Would definitely recommend to any dog owner!

reviews.author: Anonymous Horse
reviews.text: My two dogs loved Iams Dog Food even though they're usually picky eaters.

reviews.author: Anonymous Fish
reviews.text: Ruffles cleans his plate every time!

reviews.author: Anonymous Cow
reviews.text: I was starting to find fleas inside my house during the summer and I realized my dog was bringing them in. I got him this collar and my house is now flea-free!

reviews.author: Anonymous Moose
reviews.text: The collar doesn't have any smell and my dog seems to have no problem wearing it.

reviews.author: Anonymous Lion
reviews.text: This bed was big enough for my German Shephard. Would definitely recommend to other owners of large dogs!

reviews.author: Anonymous Chicken
reviews.text: Keeps my dog nice and cozy during our night jogs.

reviews.author: Anonymous Giraffe
reviews.text: Got this for my pupper on Christmas and she loves it!

reviews.author: Anonymous Duck
reviews.text: Great for carrying all my dog supplies to the dog park.

reviews.author: Anonymous Turtle
reviews.text: Very durable pack. I dropped this travel pack while hiking and it was practically unscathed after I retrieved it.

reviews.author: Anonymous Monkey
reviews.text: Ella's new favorite toy! She takes it with her to bed and it's adorable!
